xldoc.title: ProofPower and its use at RBJones.com
xldoc.description: A top level survey of the theories developed using ProofPower for the RBJones.com web site.
xldoc.keywords: x-logic xml logic proofpower gst hol set theory functor category pure
xldoc.author: rbj

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: This page provides information about ProofPower and the various formal theories developed at RBJones.com using ProofPower.

sbcol.subsec: This directory contains a collection of fragments of work using ProofPower in LaTeX documents converted to PDF for viewing. They are mainly philosophically motivated.
